mapper.insert: insert into orders(orders_no, user_no, order_date, order_tot, delivery_fee, pay_state) values(#{ordersNo}, #{userNo}, sysdate, #{orderTot}, #{deliveryFee}, 1)

insert into order_delivery(delivery_no, receiver_name, receiver_phone, delivery_address1, delivery_address2, delivery_address3, delivery_msg, orders_no) values(#{deliveryNo}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{deliveryAddress1}, #{deliveryAddress2}, #{deliveryAddress3}, #{deliveryMsg}, #{ordersNo})
insert into order_pay(pay_no, orders_no, pay_price, pay_method, pay_date) values(#{payNo}, #{ordersNo}, #{payPrice}, #{payMethod}, sysdate)
